name: Returned Sentry
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Pack Tactics
text: The Returned has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Returned's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
text: The Returned has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Unreadable Face
text: The Returned is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. Wisdom (Insight) checks to ascertain the Returned's intentions or sincerity are made with disadvantage.

action.name: Spear
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Sling
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

description: Source: Mythic Odysseys of Theros p. 241
